entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump All roads with you lead to Russia. Your a traitor. Not a care in the world for Americans whether it’s lives lost due to your failure with COVID-19 or our soldiers you knew in March were being targeted by Russia. Your best ratings will be when they drag your ass out of the WH.
